1712959330.2764215.sceneDescription: In this sequence of frames, a person is opening a package and taking out two slices of gluten-free bread from it, placing them on a wooden surface. They appear to be preparing for a meal, potentially making a sandwich.

1712959341.6974568.sceneDescription: In this segment, two slices of bread are being buttered on a wooden surface, and a container of Nuttelex Original, a dairy-free spread, is shown and used. The action is fast since the frames are one second apart, indicating the person is quickly spreading the butter substitute on both slices of bread.

1712959354.7472734.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, two slices of bread are being buttered on a wooden surface. The person is using a knife to spread butter evenly across each slice, one after the other.

1712959366.2928946.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading a creamy substance, likely butter or a spread, onto two slices of bread. The person completes spreading on one slice and starts on the other, achieving an even layer on both slices by the end of the segment.

1712959379.433044.sceneDescription: A person is unscrewing the lid of a homemade jam jar and setting the lid aside before preparing to spread the jam on two slices of bread laid out on a wooden surface. The jam is labeled "Multuerries/Raspberry & Blueberry Jam! Made: Dec 2019."

1712959395.0891693.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, two slices of bread with a spread are being prepared, and jam is being added to one of them. A person is using a knife to spread jam from a jar onto one slice of bread.

1712959408.0465083.sceneDescription: In this series of images, someone is spreading a red jam on a slice of bread, which already has a layer of what appears to be a white, herbed spread. They are using a knife to distribute the jam over the bread evenly.

1712959420.9603345.sceneDescription: In this series of frames, a person is spreading red jam onto a slice of bread, which is on a wooden surface, likely preparing a sandwich. Each frame shows the progress of the jam being spread across the slice of bread.

1712959433.2689922.sceneDescription: Two slices of bread are being prepared with spreads, one with butter and one with jam, and then they are put together to make a sandwich. The sandwich is then cut in half, completing its preparation.

1712959443.4567206.sceneDescription: A person is cutting a slice of bread into smaller triangles and then placing the pieces on a plate. This is likely part of a food preparation process, possibly making sandwiches or serving the bread as an accompaniment.

1712959453.8054564.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is slicing a sandwich into smaller triangular pieces and rearranging them on a plate. The sequence shows the sandwich being cut and the pieces being moved to create a visually pleasing arrangement on the plate.

1712959463.7845695.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is arranging triangular sandwich pieces and a breadstick on a plate to form a pattern resembling a fish. Over the span of a few seconds, they adjust the placement to achieve the final fish-like shape with the sandwiches serving as the body and fins, and the breadstick as the tail.
